cbinstall.name: CB My User Group Field
cbinstall.author: Fati CHEN
cbinstall.description: A Community Builder User Group plugin that allows users to choose a group.

params.description: The User Group field allows the user to choose a group

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_register
param.label: Forbidden words at registration
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field for registration. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_profile
param.label: Forbidden words in user profile edits
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field when user updates his profile in profile edits. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.
